abstract.p: *Burrell Communications Group names Mike Faems executive vice president and executive creative director for operations; Kurt Karlenzig and Chris Miller are named co-chief executives at Chemistri, new digital communications unit of Leo Burnett USA (S)

block.p: * Mike Faems was named executive vice president and executive creative director for operations at the Burrell Communications Group, Chicago, 49 percent owned by the Publicis Groupe S.A. He had been executive vice president and co-executive creative director at Young & Rubicam Advertising in Chicago.

* Mike Faems was named executive vice president and executive creative director for operations at the Burrell Communications Group, Chicago, 49 percent owned by the Publicis Groupe S.A. He had been executive vice president and co-executive creative director at Young & Rubicam Advertising in Chicago.

* Kurt Karlenzig, strategic planning director, and Chris Miller, marketing director, at Capps Digital, Chicago, minority owned by the B Com3 Group, were named co-chief executives at Chemistri, a new digital communications unit of Leo Burnett USA, part of the Leo Burnett Worldwide unit of B Com3 . Chemistri was formed from Capps' Digital Garage.
